page.title: 03Number of People in Sydling
page.content: There are 268 on the Electoral roll 1985. Of these 33 are children of School age, 24 of whom attend state schools. There are 13 children under school age. There are 145 households in the Parish. More than three quarters of the homes are owner occupied. 4 of the houses belong to 2nd home owners and therefore hardly ever used. 2 of the old cottages are used for Bed & Break- fast accomodation and there is also a Public House (Pub) called the Greyhound, where it is possible to stay. This means there are always visitors wandering about enjoying this lovely valley.
